su_1443306: grep '^VmSwap:' /proc/*/status \
    | grep -v '0 kB$' \
    | sed -re 's#^/proc/([0-9]+)/status:VmSwap:[ \t]+([0-9]+) kB$#\1 \2#' \
    | sort -nrk2 \
    | while read pid swap; do \
        printf "%10s kB    %-6s    " ${swap} ${pid}; \
        cat /proc/${pid}/cmdline | xargs -0 | fold -sw160 | sed -re '/^$/d; 1!s/^/\t\t\t\t/;'; \
      done \
    | less -cRS

printf "%10s kB    %-6s    " ${swap} ${pid}

    | grep -v '0 kB$' \
    | sed -re 's#^/proc/([0-9]+)/status:VmSwap:[ \t]+([0-9]+) kB$#\1 \2#' \
    | sort -nrk2 \
    | while read pid swap; do \
        printf "%10s kB    %-6s    " ${swap} ${pid}; \
        cat /proc/${pid}/cmdline | xargs -0 | fold -sw160 | sed -re '/^$/d; 1!s/^/\t\t\t\t/;'; \
      done \
    | less -cRS
